com.squareup.crypto.rsa

Class NativeRSAEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bouncycastle.crypto.engines.RSAEngine
      • com.squareup.crypto.rsa.NativeRSAEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bouncycastle.crypto.AsymmetricBlockCipher

    public final class NativeRSAEngine
extends org.bouncycastle.crypto.engines.RSAEngine
implements org.bouncycastle.crypto.AsymmetricBlockCipher
    this does your basic RSA algorithm. SQUARE: replacement for RSAEngine; this is much faster using jna-gmp.

      • init

        public void init(boolean forEncryption,
                 org.bouncycastle.crypto.CipherParameters param)
        initialise the RSA engine.
        Specified by:
        init in interface org.bouncycastle.crypto.AsymmetricBlockCipher
        Overrides:
        init in class org.bouncycastle.crypto.engines.RSAEngine
        Parameters:
        forEncryption - true if we are encrypting, false otherwise.
        param - the necessary RSA key parameters.

      • getInputBlockSize

        public int getInputBlockSize()
        Return the maximum size for an input block to this engine. For RSA this is always one byte less than the key size on encryption, and the same length as the key size on decryption.
        Specified by:
        getInputBlockSize in interface org.bouncycastle.crypto.AsymmetricBlockCipher
        Overrides:
        getInputBlockSize in class org.bouncycastle.crypto.engines.RSAEngine
        Returns:
        maximum size for an input block.

      • getOutputBlockSize

        public int getOutputBlockSize()
        Return the maximum size for an output block to this engine. For RSA this is always one byte less than the key size on decryption, and the same length as the key size on encryption.
        Specified by:
        getOutputBlockSize in interface org.bouncycastle.crypto.AsymmetricBlockCipher
        Overrides:
        getOutputBlockSize in class org.bouncycastle.crypto.engines.RSAEngine
        Returns:
        maximum size for an output block.

      • processBlock

        public byte[] processBlock(byte[] in,
                           int inOff,
                           int inLen)
        Process a single block using the basic RSA algorithm.
        Specified by:
        processBlock in interface org.bouncycastle.crypto.AsymmetricBlockCipher
        Overrides:
        processBlock in class org.bouncycastle.crypto.engines.RSAEngine
        Parameters:
        in - the input array.
        inOff - the offset into the input buffer where the data starts.
        inLen - the length of the data to be processed.
        Returns:
        the result of the RSA process.
        Throws:
        org.bouncycastle.crypto.DataLengthException - the input block is too large.
